member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Acl.ETag
member.summary: ETag of the collection.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Acl.Items
member.summary: List of rules on the access control list.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Acl.Kind
member.summary: Type of the collection ("calendar#acl").

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Acl.NextPageToken
member.summary: Token used to access the next page of this result. Omitted if no further results are available.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.AclRule.ETag
member.summary: ETag of the resource.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.AclRule.Id
member.summary: Identifier of the ACL rule.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.AclRule.Kind
member.summary: Type of the resource ("calendar#aclRule").

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.AclRule.Role
member.summary: The role assigned to the scope. Possible values are: - "none" - Provides no access. - "freeBusyReader" - Provides read access to free/busy information. - "reader" - Provides read access to the calendar. Private events will appear to users with reader access, but event details will be hidden. - "writer" - Provides read and write access to the calendar. Private events will appear to users with writer access, and event details will be visible. - "owner" - Provides ownership of the calendar. This role has all of the permissions of the writer role with the additional ability to see and manipulate ACLs.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.AclRule.Scope
member.summary: The scope of the rule.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.AclRule.ScopeData
member.summary: The scope of the rule.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.AclRule.ScopeData.Type
member.summary: The type of the scope. Possible values are: - "default" - The public scope. This is the default value. - "user" - Limits the scope to a single user. - "group" - Limits the scope to a group. - "domain" - Limits the scope to a domain. Note: The permissions granted to the "default", or public, scope apply to any user, authenticated or not.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.AclRule.ScopeData.Value
member.summary: The email address of a user or group, or the name of a domain, depending on the scope type. Omitted for type "default".

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Calendar.Description
member.summary: Description of the calendar. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Calendar.ETag
member.summary: ETag of the resource.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Calendar.Id
member.summary: Identifier of the calendar.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Calendar.Kind
member.summary: Type of the resource ("calendar#calendar").

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Calendar.Location
member.summary: Geographic location of the calendar as free-form text. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Calendar.Summary
member.summary: Title of the calendar.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Calendar.TimeZone
member.summary: The time zone of the calendar. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.CalendarList.ETag
member.summary: ETag of the collection.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.CalendarList.Items
member.summary: Calendars that are present on the user's calendar list.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.CalendarList.Kind
member.summary: Type of the collection ("calendar#calendarList").

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.CalendarList.NextPageToken
member.summary: Token used to access the next page of this result.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.CalendarListEntry.AccessRole
member.summary: The effective access role that the authenticated user has on the calendar. Read-only. Possible values are: - "freeBusyReader" - Provides read access to free/busy information. - "reader" - Provides read access to the calendar. Private events will appear to users with reader access, but event details will be hidden. - "writer" - Provides read and write access to the calendar. Private events will appear to users with writer access, and event details will be visible. - "owner" - Provides ownership of the calendar. This role has all of the permissions of the writer role with the additional ability to see and manipulate ACLs.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.CalendarListEntry.ColorId
member.summary: The color of the calendar. This is an ID referring to an entry in the "calendar" section of the colors definition (see the "colors" endpoint). Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.CalendarListEntry.DefaultReminders
member.summary: The default reminders that the authenticated user has for this calendar.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.CalendarListEntry.Description
member.summary: Description of the calendar. Optional. Read-only.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.CalendarListEntry.ETag
member.summary: ETag of the resource.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.CalendarListEntry.Hidden
member.summary: Whether the calendar has been hidden from the list. Optional. The default is False.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.CalendarListEntry.Id
member.summary: Identifier of the calendar.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.CalendarListEntry.Kind
member.summary: Type of the resource ("calendar#calendarListEntry").

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.CalendarListEntry.Location
member.summary: Geographic location of the calendar as free-form text. Optional. Read-only.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.CalendarListEntry.Selected
member.summary: Whether the calendar content shows up in the calendar UI. Optional. The default is False.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.CalendarListEntry.Summary
member.summary: Title of the calendar. Read-only.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.CalendarListEntry.SummaryOverride
member.summary: The summary that the authenticated user has set for this calendar. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.CalendarListEntry.TimeZone
member.summary: The time zone of the calendar. Optional. Read-only.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.ColorDefinition.Background
member.summary: The background color associated with this color definition.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.ColorDefinition.Foreground
member.summary: The foreground color that can be used to write on top of a background with 'background' color.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Colors.Calendar
member.summary: Palette of calendar colors, mapping from the color ID to its definition. An 'calendarListEntry' resource refers to one of these color IDs in its 'color' field. Read-only.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Colors.Event
member.summary: Palette of event colors, mapping from the color ID to its definition. An 'event' resource may refer to one of these color IDs in its 'color' field. Read-only.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Colors.Kind
member.summary: Type of the resource ("calendar#colors").

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Colors.Updated
member.summary: Last modification time of the color palette (as a RFC 3339 timestamp). Read-only.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Colors.CalendarData
member.summary: Palette of calendar colors, mapping from the color ID to its definition. An 'calendarListEntry' resource refers to one of these color IDs in its 'color' field. Read-only.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Colors.EventData
member.summary: Palette of event colors, mapping from the color ID to its definition. An 'event' resource may refer to one of these color IDs in its 'color' field. Read-only.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Error.Domain
member.summary: Domain, or broad category, of the error.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Error.Reason
member.summary: Specific reason for the error. Some of the possible values are: - "groupTooBig" - The group of users requested is too large for a single query. - "tooManyCalendarsRequested" - The number of calendars requested is too large for a single query. - "notFound" - The requested resource was not found. - "internalError" - The API service has encountered an internal error. Additional error types may be added in the future, so clients should gracefully handle additional error statuses not included in this list.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.AnyoneCanAddSelf
member.summary: Whether anyone can invite themselves to the event. Optional. The default is False.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.Attendees
member.summary: The attendees of the event.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.AttendeesOmitted
member.summary: Whether attendees have been omitted from the event's representation. When retrieving an event, this is due to a restriction specified by the 'maxAttendee' query parameter. When updating an event, this can be used to only update the participant's response. Optional. The default is False.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.ColorId
member.summary: The color of the event. This is an ID referring to an entry in the "event" section of the colors definition (see the "colors" endpoint). Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.Created
member.summary: Creation time of the event (as a RFC 3339 timestamp). Read-only.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.Creator
member.summary: The creator of the event. Read-only.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.Description
member.summary: Description of the event. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.ETag
member.summary: ETag of the resource.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.ExtendedProperties
member.summary: Extended properties of the event.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.Gadget
member.summary: A gadget that extends this event.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.GuestsCanInviteOthers
member.summary: Whether attendees other than the organizer can invite others to the event. Optional. The default is False.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.GuestsCanModify
member.summary: Whether attendees other than the organizer can modify the event. Optional. The default is False.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.GuestsCanSeeOtherGuests
member.summary: Whether attendees other than the organizer can see who the event's attendees are. Optional. The default is False.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.HtmlLink
member.summary: An absolute link to this event in the Google Calendar Web UI. Read-only.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.ICalUID
member.summary: Event ID in the iCalendar format.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.Id
member.summary: Identifier of the event.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.Kind
member.summary: Type of the resource ("calendar#event").

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.Location
member.summary: Geographic location of the event as free-form text. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.Locked
member.summary: Whether this is a locked event copy where no changes can be made to the main event fields "summary", "description", "location", "start", "end" or "recurrence". The default is False. Read-Only.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.Organizer
member.summary: The organizer of the event. If the organizer is also an attendee, this is indicated with a separate entry in 'attendees' with the 'organizer' field set to True. To change the organizer, use the "move" operation. Read-only, except when importing an event.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.PrivateCopy
member.summary: Whether this is a private event copy where changes are not shared with other copies on other calendars. Optional. Immutable.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.Recurrence
member.summary: List of RRULE, EXRULE, RDATE and EXDATE lines for a recurring event. This field is omitted for single events or instances of recurring events.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.RecurringEventId
member.summary: For an instance of a recurring event, this is the event ID of the recurring event itself. Immutable.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.Reminders
member.summary: Information about the event's reminders for the authenticated user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.Sequence
member.summary: Sequence number as per iCalendar.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.Status
member.summary: Status of the event. Optional. Possible values are: - "confirmed" - The event is confirmed. This is the default status. - "tentative" - The event is tentatively confirmed. - "cancelled" - The event is cancelled.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.Summary
member.summary: Title of the event.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.Transparency
member.summary: Whether the event blocks time on the calendar. Optional. Possible values are: - "opaque" - The event blocks time on the calendar. This is the default value. - "transparent" - The event does not block time on the calendar.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.Updated
member.summary: Last modification time of the event (as a RFC 3339 timestamp). Read-only.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.Visibility
member.summary: Visibility of the event. Optional. Possible values are: - "default" - Uses the default visibility for events on the calendar. This is the default value. - "public" - The event is public and event details are visible to all readers of the calendar. - "private" - The event is private and only event attendees may view event details. - "confidential" - The event is private. This value is provided for compatibility reasons.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.CreatorData
member.summary: The creator of the event. Read-only.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.CreatorData.DisplayName
member.summary: The creator's name, if available.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.CreatorData.Email
member.summary: The creator's email address, if available.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.CreatorData.Id
member.summary: The creator's Profile ID, if available.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.CreatorData.Self
member.summary: Whether the creator corresponds to the calendar on which this copy of the event appears. Read-only. The default is False.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.ExtendedPropertiesData
member.summary: Extended properties of the event.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.ExtendedPropertiesData.Private
member.summary: Properties that are private to the copy of the event that appears on this calendar.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.ExtendedPropertiesData.Shared
member.summary: Properties that are shared between copies of the event on other attendees' calendars.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.ExtendedPropertiesData.PrivateData
member.summary: Properties that are private to the copy of the event that appears on this calendar.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.ExtendedPropertiesData.SharedData
member.summary: Properties that are shared between copies of the event on other attendees' calendars.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.GadgetData
member.summary: A gadget that extends this event.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.GadgetData.Display
member.summary: The gadget's display mode. Optional. Possible values are: - "icon" - The gadget displays next to the event's title in the calendar view. - "chip" - The gadget displays when the event is clicked.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.GadgetData.Height
member.summary: The gadget's height in pixels. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.GadgetData.IconLink
member.summary: The gadget's icon URL.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.GadgetData.Link
member.summary: The gadget's URL.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.GadgetData.Preferences
member.summary: Preferences.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.GadgetData.Title
member.summary: The gadget's title.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.GadgetData.Type
member.summary: The gadget's type.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.GadgetData.Width
member.summary: The gadget's width in pixels. Optional.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.GadgetData.PreferencesData
member.summary: Preferences.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.OrganizerData
member.summary: The organizer of the event. If the organizer is also an attendee, this is indicated with a separate entry in 'attendees' with the 'organizer' field set to True. To change the organizer, use the "move" operation. Read-only, except when importing an event.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.OrganizerData.DisplayName
member.summary: The organizer's name, if available.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.OrganizerData.Email
member.summary: The organizer's email address, if available.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.OrganizerData.Id
member.summary: The organizer's Profile ID, if available.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.OrganizerData.Self
member.summary: Whether the organizer corresponds to the calendar on which this copy of the event appears. Read-only. The default is False.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.RemindersData
member.summary: Information about the event's reminders for the authenticated user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.RemindersData.Overrides
member.summary: If the event doesn't use the default reminders, this lists the reminders specific to the event, or, if not set, indicates that no reminders are set for this event.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Event.RemindersData.UseDefault
member.summary: Whether the default reminders of the calendar apply to the event.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.EventAttendee.AdditionalGuests
member.summary: Number of additional guests. Optional. The default is 0.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.EventAttendee.Comment
member.summary: The attendee's response comment. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.EventAttendee.DisplayName
member.summary: The attendee's name, if available. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.EventAttendee.Email
member.summary: The attendee's email address, if available. This field must be present when adding an attendee.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.EventAttendee.Id
member.summary: The attendee's Profile ID, if available.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.EventAttendee.Optional
member.summary: Whether this is an optional attendee. Optional. The default is False.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.EventAttendee.Organizer
member.summary: Whether the attendee is the organizer of the event. Read-only. The default is False.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.EventAttendee.Resource
member.summary: Whether the attendee is a resource. Read-only. The default is False.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.EventAttendee.ResponseStatus
member.summary: The attendee's response status. Possible values are: - "needsAction" - The attendee has not responded to the invitation. - "declined" - The attendee has declined the invitation. - "tentative" - The attendee has tentatively accepted the invitation. - "accepted" - The attendee has accepted the invitation.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.EventAttendee.Self
member.summary: Whether this entry represents the calendar on which this copy of the event appears. Read-only. The default is False.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.EventDateTime.Date
member.summary: The date, in the format "yyyy-mm-dd", if this is an all-day event.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.EventDateTime.DateTime
member.summary: The time, as a combined date-time value (formatted according to RFC 3339). A time zone offset is required unless a time zone is explicitly specified in 'timeZone'.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.EventDateTime.TimeZone
member.summary: The name of the time zone in which the time is specified (e.g. "Europe/Zurich"). Optional. The default is the time zone of the calendar.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.EventReminder.Method
member.summary: The method used by this reminder. Possible values are: - "email" - Reminders are sent via email. - "sms" - Reminders are sent via SMS. - "popup" - Reminders are sent via a UI popup.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.EventReminder.Minutes
member.summary: Number of minutes before the start of the event when the reminder should trigger.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Events.AccessRole
member.summary: The user's access role for this calendar. Read-only. Possible values are: - "none" - The user has no access. - "freeBusyReader" - The user has read access to free/busy information. - "reader" - The user has read access to the calendar. Private events will appear to users with reader access, but event details will be hidden. - "writer" - The user has read and write access to the calendar. Private events will appear to users with writer access, and event details will be visible. - "owner" - The user has ownership of the calendar. This role has all of the permissions of the writer role with the additional ability to see and manipulate ACLs.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Events.DefaultReminders
member.summary: The default reminders on the calendar for the authenticated user. These reminders apply to all events on this calendar that do not explicitly override them (i.e. do not have 'reminders.useDefault' set to 'true').

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Events.Description
member.summary: Description of the calendar. Read-only.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Events.ETag
member.summary: ETag of the collection.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Events.Items
member.summary: List of events on the calendar.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Events.Kind
member.summary: Type of the collection ("calendar#events").

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Events.NextPageToken
member.summary: Token used to access the next page of this result. Omitted if no further results are available.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Events.Summary
member.summary: Title of the calendar. Read-only.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Events.TimeZone
member.summary: The time zone of the calendar. Read-only.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Events.Updated
member.summary: Last modification time of the calendar (as a RFC 3339 timestamp). Read-only.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.FreeBusyCalendar.Busy
member.summary: List of time ranges during which this calendar should be regarded as busy.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.FreeBusyCalendar.Errors
member.summary: Optional error(s) (if computation for the calendar failed).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.FreeBusyGroup.Calendars
member.summary: List of calendars' identifiers within a group.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.FreeBusyGroup.Errors
member.summary: Optional error(s) (if computation for the group failed).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.FreeBusyRequest.CalendarExpansionMax
member.summary: Maximal number of calendars for which FreeBusy information is to be provided. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.FreeBusyRequest.GroupExpansionMax
member.summary: Maximal number of calendar identifiers to be provided for a single group. Optional. An error will be returned for a group with more members than this value.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.FreeBusyRequest.Items
member.summary: List of calendars and/or groups to query.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.FreeBusyRequest.TimeMax
member.summary: The end of the interval for the query.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.FreeBusyRequest.TimeMin
member.summary: The start of the interval for the query.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.FreeBusyRequest.TimeZone
member.summary: Time zone used in the response. Optional. The default is UTC.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.FreeBusyRequestItem.Id
member.summary: The identifier of a calendar or a group.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.FreeBusyResponse.Calendars
member.summary: List of free/busy information for calendars.

member.summary: Expansion of groups.

member.summary: The end of the interval.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.FreeBusyResponse.CalendarsData
member.summary: List of free/busy information for calendars.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.FreeBusyResponse.GroupsData

member.summary: Name of the user setting.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Setting.Value
member.summary: Value of the user setting. The format of the value depends on the ID of the setting.

member.summary: Etag of the collection.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.Data.Settings.Items
member.summary: List of user settings.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.EventsResource.GetRequest.AlwaysIncludeEmail
member.summary: Whether to always include a value in the "email" field for the organizer, creator and attendees, even if no real email is available (i.e. a generated, non-working value will be provided). The use of this option is discouraged and should only be used by clients which cannot handle the absence of an email address value in the mentioned places. Optional. The default is False.

member.summary: The maximum number of attendees to include in the response. If there are more than the specified number of attendees, only the participant is returned. Optional.

member.summary: Time zone used in the response. Optional. The default is the time zone of the calendar.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.EventsResource.InstancesRequest.PageToken
member.summary: Token specifying which result page to return. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.EventsResource.InstancesRequest.ShowDeleted
member.summary: Whether to include deleted events (with 'eventStatus' equals 'cancelled') in the result. Optional. The default is False.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.EventsResource.InstancesRequest.TimeZone
member.summary: Time zone used in the response. Optional. The default is the time zone of the calendar.

member.summary: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

member.summary: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters. Overrides userIp if both are provided.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.EventsResource.ListRequest.AlwaysIncludeEmail
member.summary: Whether to always include a value in the "email" field for the organizer, creator and attendees, even if no real email is available (i.e. a generated, non-working value will be provided). The use of this option is discouraged and should only be used by clients which cannot handle the absence of an email address value in the mentioned places. Optional. The default is False.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.EventsResource.ListRequest.CalendarId
member.summary: Calendar identifier.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.EventsResource.ListRequest.ICalUID
member.summary: Specifies iCalendar UID (iCalUID) of events to be included in the response. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.EventsResource.ListRequest.MaxAttendees
member.summary: The maximum number of attendees to include in the response. If there are more than the specified number of attendees, only the participant is returned. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.EventsResource.ListRequest.MaxResults
member.summary: Maximum number of events returned on one result page. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.EventsResource.ListRequest.OrderBy
member.summary: The order of the events returned in the result. Optional. The default is an unspecified, stable order.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.EventsResource.ListRequest.PageToken
member.summary: Token specifying which result page to return. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.EventsResource.ListRequest.Q
member.summary: Free text search terms to find events that match these terms in any field, except for extended properties. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.EventsResource.ListRequest.ShowDeleted
member.summary: Whether to include deleted events (with 'eventStatus' equals 'cancelled') in the result. Optional. The default is False.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.EventsResource.ListRequest.ShowHiddenInvitations
member.summary: Whether to include hidden invitations in the result. Optional. The default is False.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.EventsResource.ListRequest.SingleEvents
member.summary: Whether to expand recurring events into instances and only return single one-off events and instances of recurring events, but not the underlying recurring events themselves. Optional. The default is False.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.EventsResource.ListRequest.TimeMax
member.summary: Upper bound (exclusive) for an event's start time to filter by. Optional. The default is not to filter by start time.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.EventsResource.ListRequest.TimeMin
member.summary: Lower bound (inclusive) for an event's end time to filter by. Optional. The default is not to filter by end time.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.EventsResource.ListRequest.TimeZone
member.summary: Time zone used in the response. Optional. The default is the time zone of the calendar.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Calendar.v3.EventsResource.ListRequest.UpdatedMin
member.summary: Lower bound for an event's last modification time (as a RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by. Optional. The default is not to filter by last modification time.
